metadata.name: Beware of the Wolves
metadata.description:
Paris, 1900. Misery reigns in the capital. Many young people, out of school and unemployed, are experiencing poverty and lives in the streets. Nicknamed the "Apaches", many gangs appear in Paris. For 10 years, the "Wolves of the Mound" reign over Montmartreâ€™s Mound.

Aged from 15 to 20 years old, armed with knives and revolvers, they sow terror wherever they go. this is the law of the strongest. No matter the age, the leader is usually the strongest, the best fighter and the most feared. Their targets were mostly rich people and the police. The Wolves used to go out at nightfall, taking advantage of the darkness. Kids of Montmartre, the members of the gang knows every corner of the Mound. Attracted by parties, balls and alcohol, it was fights, thefts, assaults and often murders that enlivened the long hours of the night, terrorizing the inhabitants.

Location: Paris
Date: 04/01/2023
Artist: Joffrey Briaud
Size: 4138x5793
License: Extended Editorial
